title: Apollo Profit Edges Lower, but Distributable Earnings Hit Record
sub_head: Firmâ€™s $8.8 billion of asset sales help drive level of profit that can be returned to shareholders
body:
Apollo Global Management Inc. reported lower third-quarter profit, but the portion of its earnings that it could hand back to shareholders climbed to a record level.
The New York company posted net income of $258.3 million, or $1.01 per share, down from $272.4 million, or $1.11 per share, a year earlier.
